column1: #Text=Iroh says : " After Zuko 's outburst in the meeting , the Fire Lord became very angry with him .
#Text=Zuko looked upon the old general he had insulted and declared that he was not afraid .
#Text=When he turned to face his opponent , he was surprised to see it was not the general .
#Text=Zuko had spoken out against the general 's plan , but by doing so in the Fire Lord 's war room , it was the Fire Lord whom he had disrespected .
#Text=Zuko would have to duel his own father .
